author: GameSpot
description:
PUBG: BLINDSPOT is a 5v5 top-down tactical shooter set in the PUBG universe.

Players share information through their field of view, leveraging vision, angles, and a variety of gadgets to engage in fast-paced, high-intensity tactical combat. 

Rather than focusing on traditional aim-centric gunplay, PUBG: BLINDSPOT redefines the shooter experience around information control, positioning, and team coordination.

Play PUBG: BLINDSPOT on Steam starting February 5, 2026.

#pubg #gaming #blindspot #pubgblindspot
title: PUBG: BLINDSPOT | Early Access Announcement Gameplay Trailer

author: GameSpot
description:
A voyager, swept by ocean currents into a bustling world of pirates:
new companions, new ways to play, new adventures.

Nothing on the sea is ever certain—
at every turn, chance encounters await.

What was meant to be a carefree voyage begins to shift as memories surface—
a name, a past, the truth.

When the next moment arrives, how will the voyager choose, and how will they return?

February 5 — the "Wanderer Test" awaits.
All aboard!

#SeaofRemnants #OpenWorld #RPG
title: Sea of Remnants - Official "Wanderer Test" Gameplay Preview Trailer

author: GameSpot
description:
The Mario Tennis Fever game launches February 12, 2026, exclusively on the Nintendo Switch 2 system. 

It's tennis...with a twist! Mix and match 38 playable characters, the most in series history, with 30 all-new Fever Rackets, each with different special effects! Use familiar tennis actions and new defensive maneuvers, get a rally going in a variety of game modes, help Mario and friends return to normal in the story-driven Adventure mode, and ace it in local* or online** play! 

*Additional games, systems, and/or accessories may be required for multiplayer mode. Games, systems, and some accessories sold separately. 

**Nintendo Switch Online membership (sold separately) and Nintendo Account required for online features. Membership auto-renews after initial term at the then-current price unless canceled. Not available in all countries. Internet access required for online features. Terms apply. nintendo.com/purchase-terms/

What Mario character would you team up with for a doubles game
title: Mario Tennis Fever – Official Gameplay Overview Trailer
